title: Gold Rush

embed.description: An account of my experience climbing to Gold for season rewards, and some important lessons along the way. It was my first time playing ranked past placements and was only possible because of my wonderful duo partner whose patience and fun were a godsend after being placed in B3.

body:
This was my first season seriously playing ranked (and I only did so because I had a duo), the video is a collection of some of the games I had from BII (didn't get any from BIII where I was placed) through GV. It's not meant to be as funny as some of the others cause I was trying somethign a bit different, wanted it to be like a light-hearted account of my experiences.

Anyway let me know what you think :)

replies.body:
I will say that i might not entirely agree with the way it's presented, it's a great video in showing the things people need to take into account for ranked.

Sub's and up votes from me.
Thank you so much. I know I've still got a long way to go, still working on presentation/edits and I don't have a 'style' yet either. Thank you for the sub, I'm gonna keep trying to improve :)
